title:
Resurgence and Riemann-Hilbert problems for elliptic Calabi-Yau
  threefolds
abstract:
Let $X$ be a Calabi-Yau threefold with an elliptic fibration. We investigate
the non-linear Riemann-Hilbert problems associated to the Donaldson-Thomas
theory of fibre classes, and relate them to the Borel sum of the $A$-model
topological string free energy for such classes.
